name: Xonotic
summary: Xonotic is an addictive, arena-style first person shooter with crisp movement and a wide array of weapons. It combines intuitive mechanics with in-your-face action to elevate your heart rate. Xonotic is and will always be free-to-play. It is available under the copyleft-style GPLv3+ license.

name: X-Out
summary:
X-Out is a horizontally scrolling shoot-em-up with eight levels and an underwater setting.

Between levels, the player visits a shop and use their game score to purchase new submarines and equipment. The submarines come in four different variants, and additional purchases act as additional "lives". Each can be equipped with a one-way, two-way or three-way fire weapon of increasing power (and thus cost). Secondary weapons include sonic waves, powershots and target-seeking missiles. The player can also purchase auxiliary satellites and specify their movement pattern, which can be circular orbits, vertical and horizontal movements, or an intercepting action.

name: Xotic
summary: Xotic is an arcade-style first-person shooter where you rack up huge scores by shooting enemies, detonating chain reactions, and discovering secret power-ups and point multipliers. Armed with a weaponized symbiotic creature called the Macroterra, you must cleanse the evil presence and re-plant the seeds of life on a planet ravaged by the minions of the Orb.

name: Xolt
summary:
- WARNING - Playing Xolt might increase your IQ!

Xolt is an addictive number puzzle game inspired by 2048 and Chess, with levels, upgrades, achievements in a beautiful Stonehenge theme.

name: XO Patterns
summary: In XO Patterns, your goal is to find out the order of the buttons and input the patterns correctly. Challenge yourself!

name: XOXO Droplets
summary: A massive otome dating sim about a humorously jerky young lady and her mission to woo one of multiple uniquely, but equally, obnoxious guys.

name: xoEl Empire
summary: The Yabbies used to live in harmony, but everything changed... When the xoEl empire attacked. Now, they are trapped waiting his squared destiny and you, blessed by an unknown power, are the only one who can save them... Rotate, Match colours and solve tons of puzzles in your way to freedom.

name: XorceD - Sashiro's Laedrum
summary: Play as Sashiro Kobata, a World-Peacemaker (WPM) officer with an incredible dual-wielding pistol skill, in an undercover mission! His WPM-group has found out information about a terrorist group. The information: A highschool student is supposed to be the leader of that terrorist group! In order to maintain world-peace and to stop the terrorist group, Sashiro has to identify the leader by transferring to the school as a student. Will he be able to find out the truth?

name: XO-Planets
summary: Frantic rogue-lite, action platformer, and tower defense, with a little rpg elements.

name: Xonox - Robin Hood/Sir Lancelot
summary:
As one of the Xonox "Double Ender" cartridges, this features Robin Hood and Sir Lancelot. Each of the two games was released separately, though it's generally more common to find them in this form. This particular double-ender is the most common to feature either of these games.
The Double-Ender is two games in one - each end of the cartridge has a different game. These cartridges are about 2.5 inches longer than a standard cartridge, and the case is wider in the middle. There is one long label that is typically blue, with game art for both sides split diagonally down the middle. Titles are printed in red text against a yellow banner. All the titles found on the Double-Enders can also be found in standard single-ended cases.
Xonox, based in Minnesota, started developing Atari cartridges during the height of the 2600's popularity. They contributed many high quality games available for the early platforms. Xonox capitalized on the novelty and perceived value of "double-ender" cartridges. These could be inserted into the console on one of the two ends, each end offering a different game. Different double-ender configurations could package the same game with different counterparts. Xonox was not the first company to try this; Playaround did it earlier with their adult-themed titles. Xonox eventually abandoned this idea and began releasing single versions of some of the titles previously offered as double-enders as well as a few new titles.
Xonox was one of many small video game companies to fold during the Video Game Crash of 1983.

name: Xonox Double-Ender: Tomarc the Barbarian & Motocross Racer
summary:
This is a compilation containing two Xonox games on a single cartridge. The games are:

- Tomarc the Barbarian
- Motocross Racer

name: Xor
summary: A 2D puzzle game. The player controls two shields, Magus and Questor, which can be moved horizontally and vertically though the maze, in order to collect masks. The object of each level is to collect all the masks, then reach the exit. In all levels, use of both shields are required for completion, and in some, one shield must be sacrificed (walled in or destroyed) in order to complete the level.

name: Xonox Double-Ender: Robin Hood & Sir Lancelot
summary: The Xonox Double-ender is a unique cartridge with the ability to flip the side and play the second game.

name: X Operations
summary: X Operations is a realistic team-based shooter that focuses on tactical planning. The game was released in 2003.

name: Xorple
summary: Xorple is a combination of puzzle, action, and match games. Different shapes of random colors will attempt to collide with your center piece. You must use the buttons to match the shapes and colors as they collide with your center piece.

name: XON Episode Two
summary:
XON is a puzzle adventure game inspired by games like Myst and Riven.

Explore a unique world and reveal its mysteries...

name: XON Episode Three
summary:
XON is a puzzle adventure game inspired by games like Myst and Riven.

Explore a unique world and reveal its mysteries...

name: XO
summary: XO is a relentless, strategic fleet defense game blending real-time with pause, political intrigue and a punishing drive to survive. Take command of the last battleship, gather a fleet and try to unite five hostile factions in a desperate bid to save humanity from an unbeatable enemy.

name: Xobox
summary: New generation of tic-tac-toe game in VR and 3D. XoboX is an addictive noughts and crosses game enriched with an extra dimension that will draw you into long hours of play and fun for everyone in any age.

name: XOXO Blood Droplets
summary: A collection of very short stories. Xoxo Blood Droplets is an absurd, dark comedy, twisted romance Visual Novel about terrible things happening to terrible people. The fun comes not from avoiding the potential horrors, but by seeing just how many ways things can go wrong.

name: Xong VR
summary: Xong - A ball skyrockets back and forth between you and another player. You are in a command center controlling a paddle. You can bounce the play ball towards your opponent by simply positioning yourself in front of it and waiting for it to bounce off you. The goal is to get the xong ball into the competitions goal.

name: Xonox Double Ender: Artillery Duel/Ghost Manor
Xoo: Xeno Xafari
summary: Xoo: Xeno Xafari is a new style of collecting RPG. Wander a beautiful, deserted island and search for alien creatures!

name: Xob
summary: Xob. Kinetic. Psychedelic. Poetic. Aesthetic. 100 masterfully designed puzzles.

name: Xombee
summary: First Person Zombie Shooter

name: Xol
summary: Ball meets cubes. A love story in the making. And a tough Isometric Physics Platformer.

name: XOXO Droplets: Full Version Extension
summary: Bump your boyfriend prospects up by six more with the option to date Bae Pyoun, Jeremy King, Pran Taylor, Kam Sung, Adrian Wulu, and Lucas Kaiser.

name: Xoxo Droplets: Extended Edition
summary: A massive otome dating sim!

name: Xoxo Academy
summary: A school themed EXO otome.

name: Xolotl
summary: Jump, dash, and swim in this epic adventure! Explore the vast Aztec lands of Xochimilco in an axolotl action-platformer! Xolotl is a tough, 2D action-platformer, in which your goal is to regain your godly form and powers.

name: Xordle
summary: A daily word guessing game where players must uncover two secret words on one shared board. The secret words share no common letters. Has both a daily and an unlimited variant.

name: Xoldiers
summary: Xoldiers is a shooting game where, leading a team of nine "xoldiers", the player's goal on each level is to get past the enemy defenses--cannons and tanks that shoot occasionally, garages that release instantly-killing trucks, and barracks that spit out endless waves of enemy infantry--and destroy all the enemy bases.

name: Xotic: Warp Field Expansion Pack
summary: Unlock the secrets of the warp field as you explore the mysterious energy conduit that teleports you between locations on the planet’s surface!

name: Xotic: Temple Crypt Expansion Pack
summary: Explore the mystical crypts and forgotten passageways beneath the planet’s surface as you eliminate the presence of the orb in this exciting update.

name: Xotic: Pipe Works Expansion Pack
summary: The Pipe Works DLC adds three new levels to Xotic (2 bonus levels and one combat level). Each level comes with 4 game modes and new achievements to earn. Explore the towers of metal and ancient aqueducts beneath the planet’s surface and eliminate the presence of the orb in this exciting update for one of the most unique indie games of...

name: XON Episode Four
summary:
XON is a puzzle adventure game inspired by games like Myst and Riven.
Explore a unique world and reveal its mysteries...

name: XO Master
summary:
Are you up for a 5-in-a-row xo game?
Want to enjoy both single offline tic tac toe & online tic tac toe multiplayer battles?
Well, you get that and much more with XO Master - Offline & Online 5-in-a-row Tic Tac Toe! The most addictive version of a tic tac toe game is finally here! Unlike the classical tic tac toe, you probably played at school, in this version you will have to draw 5-in-a-row on the mega xo board to win!

name: Xonix
summary: Xonix is a classic arcade-style DOS game which was probably inspired by Qix. In the game, the player controls a small marker that moves on a rectangular playfield. The goal is to claim a certain percentage of the playfield by drawing lines with the marker around areas that have not been claimed yet. The player must avoid collisions with balls bouncing around the playfield to avoid losing a life.

name: Xon
summary: Create and control your own world in Xon, a real-time god game. Use powerful miracles to shape the land, guide your people, and build structures. Play with or against other players to compete for victory and gain points for your accomplishments. Will you be the one to lead your people to glory?

name: Xochi's Apothecary
summary: A deceptively cozy narrative game about an alchemist that immigrates to a new country and opens an apothecary. Get to know your weird and wonderful community, brew the potions your customers need, and use your words to stir up a country on the brink of change.

name: Xonix
summary: Remake of a classic old-school hit from 80s, one of the first arcade games ever!

name: XOR
summary: An unofficial port of XOR for the Uzebox.

name: XOP Black Ultra
summary: XOP Black Ultra is an extensive update to XOP Black, a 2D arcade-style vertical shoot-em-up, with more levels of crazy bullet hell gameplay, more extra game modes, and even more enemies and giant bosses to blow up!

name: Xombycapyse
summary:
a seizure inducing negative romp into a dark world deep world filled with intrigue and swors. There also happen to be shields. The main character is set. He has a propensity for making treks to the forest and random people's houses. There is a time limit before the Xombycapyse occurs and this is the worst of the worst!

Made for the RMN 2012 Horror Game Contest in less than a day!

name: Xonix
summary: Remake of a classic old-school hit, one of the first arcade games ever!

name: XON Episode One
summary:
XON is a first person puzzle adventure game.
Explore a unique world and reveal its mysteries...

name: X-Out: Resurfaced
summary: The underwater shoot ‘em up from game developer Rainbow Arts is finally returning in a faithful remake completely rebuilt from the ground up and greatly improved. The sprite work of yesteryear has not only been remade into modern high-resolution sprites but also expanded with particle and lighting effects.

name: Xontainer Meta Space
summary: Xontainer Meta Space is a logistics simulation game with advanced AI NPCs you can interact with via voice or text. Manage trucks, customize vehicles, complete warehouse missions, operate forklifts, generate energy, and use an in-game smartphone for tasks, calls, and money transfers.

name: Xolo & the Forgotten Gods
summary: Xolo and the Forgotten Gods is a 2.5D action-Metroidvania that follows a fearless Xolocuitzintli dog who must utilize a variety of powerful shapeshifting alebrije abilities to help rescue both his homeland and his best friend from crooked Spanish conquistadors and their sinister allies.

name: Xociety
summary:
XOCIETY is a third-person POP Shooter with an Extraction-based gameplay RPG core. Set in a deep Sci-Fi world. Starting with a core shooter experience XOCIETY will evolve into an engagement-first player experience. Featuring PvP and PvE gameplay combined with RPG mechanics.

Shoot, Earn, Pioneer: Now We Live in XOCIETY.
Welcome to XOCIETY.

XOCIETY aims to redefine gaming experiences with a strong emphasis on player engagement. It gives TPS players economic control, allowing them to take on the role of key economic agents within XOCIETY. In traditional TPS games, players' actions have little impact on the environment and market economy.

However, in XOCIETY, every decision you make creates diverse effects on gameplay, the environment, and the overall market economy.
Gain voting power, build wealth, and pioneer a new world.
That’s why we live in XOCIETY.

We invite you to join us on XOCIETY's Early Access journey. Participate now and experience the new world XOCIETY seeks to create. Your feedback will be invaluable to the game's development. Let us know what excites you and what could be improved. Together, we’ll shape the future of XOCIETY.

Take the challenge now! We’ll be waiting for you in XOCIETY.

name: Xonix32
summary: Xonix32 is a remake of the DOS game Xonix for the Windows platform. The gameplay is the same: the player controls a marker and has to cut off pieces of the playfield, creating a big safe area, while avoiding to be hit by the enemies.

name: XOL: Space Mech Wars
summary: Mech FPS game in Space Fight in all directions of space, follow the story and contribute to the space wars of your homeland! Survive as an up-and-coming soldier with the toughest warriors around!

name: XO Evolved
summary: XO evolved is a revolutionary new twist to the game of tic tac toe. XO Evolved is a much more complex and strategic version of tic tac toe, featuring more shapes, exciting mechanics such as lasers, and cards with special effects to turn the tide of the game.
